assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: S.J., B.K., Yeonkyung K., and Y.J.K. were employed by Clinomics Inc. B.C.K. and Jong B. are the CEOs of Clinomics Inc. The remaining authors declare that the research was conducted in the absence of any commercial or financial relationships that could be constructed as a potential conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Approval was granted by the institutional review board (IRB) of the Ulsan National Institute of Science and Technology (UNISTIRB-15-19-A).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants included in the study.
